name: Continuity Error
description: One random card you played last turn is echoed this turn, at +20% effectiveness.

immediateEffect.script: var lastTurnCards = Player.LastTurnPlayedCards; if (lastTurnCards != null && lastTurnCards.Count > 0) { var echoed = lastTurnCards[Rng.Next(lastTurnCards.Count)]; Battle.EchoCard = echoed; Battle.EchoEffectiveness = 1.20; Log(PlayerDisplayName + " exploits a continuity error! " + echoed.Name + " echoes at 120% effectiveness!"); } else { Log("No cards to echo from last turn!"); }
